name: Thinking at night
description:
This is my free music game making by RPG Maker MV for Taiwan RPG maker game design contest 2020,
If you just want to listen my music, check my SoundCloud playlist (thinking at night)

* Some keyboard don't support multi-input at same time, you would need to set keys fitting for your device
(RPG Maker also restrict original keys, I am so sorry if it confuse you, next version could fix the problem )
* In gaming (v1.1~), if you want to pause, press "Shift" key
* The game use auto-saving in browser local storage
* More information, follow the article in my blog (traditional chinese)
